General.Name: Cariboo Rose Resources Ltd
General.Description: Cariboo Rose Resources Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Western Canada. The company explores for copper, gold, molybdenum, zinc, cobalt, silver, and other precious and base metal properties. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 325 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1Z7
